descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b][size=4] Created version 2: Very dramatic fantasy paint looking with crazy contrast. Use 3 layered bloom, a tint layer, a soft midtone layer, and an insanely strong highlight layer. Removed adaptation so there should not be any over bright issue. Its post processing is somehow counter logic so it doesn\'t look like any ENB preset I know of. Just download v2, you won\'t regret it. 
 [/size][/b][/color]

[size=5]What\'s special about this ENB[/size]

* Infinite dynamic range. If you count monitor and eyes\' limitation, perhaps 20 times LDR?
* Very intense local contrast enhancement
* Highly saturated and contrasted bloom

[color=red][size=5][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color]

!!!MUST HAVE!!!

* ENB Series binary 182 or later: [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0188.htm]http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0188.htm[/url]
** ENB 186 binary is known to have better performance (I haven\'t used myself and it\'s not officially released). If you want give it a try, check Unreal Warfare\'s (thank you :] ) site: http://beautifulskyrim.yolasite.com/
* ENB Series Helper Mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36318//?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36318//?[/url]

!!!REQUIRED BUT NOT ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY!!!

*Climates of Tamriel 3.1: this ENB is developed based on it. Visual could be different without this mod
*Realistic Lighting Overhaul: this ENB is developed based on it. Visual could be different without this mod

[color=red][size=5][b]Recommended Graphics Mods[/b][/size][/color]

Here\'s the list of mods I am using
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o0R7bxU.png[/IMG]

[color=red][size=5][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

1. Extract all files under \"WrapperVersion\" folder from ENB Series zip to your game folder. 
2. Download my zip file and extract those files to your game folder, overwriting the original ENB files
3. Install ENB Helper Mod
4. Play

[size=5]Known Issues[/size]

Since it\'s an early version, there might be issues. If you like this preset and want me to fix (if possible), just post to let me know. 

[size=5]If you get bored of dramatic[/size]

Check my realism preset [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38003//?]Imperfect ENB[/url], honestly it\'s way more subtle and took me much much more time to tweak.
author: wonderfulmore
